item.title: Testing with simulator??
item.dc:creator: okmred
item.description:
Is there a way to test with the simulator?
I do not have an apple app account just yet and wanted to test the app locally to make sure I am doing things correctly. Thanks for any thoughts.

item.title: Reply To: Testing with simulator??
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

You can’t test out recognition quality, sorry. It will run on the simulator, but the quality of recognition will be significantly worse than on a device, so it can’t be used for information about accuracy.

item.title: Reply To: Testing with simulator??
item.dc:creator: okmred
item.description: Ok, but it should acknowledge “something”…ok, that should be good enough for my unit testing. Thanks, that helps.
